SQL: SELECT REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.UUID, REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.SUB_NUMBER, REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.SUB_NAME, REP_SUBSTANCE_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NAME, REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.SPECIFICATION_TYPE, REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.ISRECYCLE, REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.UNIT, REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.PRICE, REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.SUPPLIER, REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.CREATE_DATE FROM REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE LEFT JOIN REP_SUBSTANCE_CATEGORY ON REP_SUBSTANCE_CATEGORY.UUID = REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.SUB_CATEGORY LEFT JOIN T_S_USERCARDINFO tsu ON REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.create_by = tsu.user_name LEFT JOIN t_s_user tsus ON tsu.user_card_id = tsus.cardid LEFT JOIN T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE tsrub ON tsrub.userid = tsus. ID WHERE tsrub.orgid IN ( SELECT T . ID FROM T_S_DEPART T START WITH T . ID = ( SELECT DISTINCT tsrub.orgid FROM T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE tsrub WHERE tsrub.userid = '${userId}' ) CONNECT BY T .parentdepartid = PRIOR T . ID ) AND (REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.ISDELETED IS NULL OR REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.ISDELETED = 0) <#if subNumber? exists &&subNumber ?length gt 0> and REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.SUB_NUMBER like '%' || '${subNumber}' || '%' </#if> <#if subName? exists &&subName ?length gt 0> and REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.SUB_NAME like '%' || '${subName}' || '%' </#if> <#if subCatagory? exists &&subCatagory ?length gt 0> and REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.SUB_CATEGORY like '%' || '${subCatagory}' || '%' </#if> ORDER BY REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE.CREATE_DATE DESC
